plot outline: Priya Berde, Suchitra Bandekar and Kishori Godbole, the three housewives and old-time friends are fed up with their routine lives. To bring some spice to their lives, they decide to do something different and thrilling. They head to a tourist destination to without their spouses. But as soon as they reach their destination, they find themselves neck-deep in trouble. There's a murder in the resort and they are the prime suspects. And to top it all, their respective husbands Makrand Anaspure, Prasad Oak, Abhiram Bhadkamkar also land up in the same hotel to celebrate New Year's.
title: Full 3 Dhamaal
plot: Three friends, who rocked in college, get tied in family customs after marriage. A few years later, they meet again and decide to live their life as before while their husbands are away.

Priya Berde, Suchitra Bandekar and Kishori Godbole, the three housewives and old-time friends are fed up with their routine lives. To bring some spice to their lives, they decide to do something different and thrilling. They head to a tourist destination to without their spouses. But as soon as they reach their destination, they find themselves neck-deep in trouble. There's a murder in the resort and they are the prime suspects. And to top it all, their respective husbands Makrand Anaspure, Prasad Oak, Abhiram Bhadkamkar also land up in the same hotel to celebrate New Year's.

Prema,Kishori and Saudamini are best friends and lived a cheerful college life.After their marriage they are tied up with their family customs and no time for their own when the three meet up they plan a vacation.They soon land to trouble as suspects of murder which has taken place in the hotel they are living.While their respective husband's Vijay,Sunil and Rahul reach the same hotel to celebrate new years eve.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
